name: Planet Q (LD38)
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 38. Warning: Linux version not tested. Mac and Windows versions tested on latest versions of OS.

Please give feedback at https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/38/$15898 while judging is going on.

The inhabitants of Planet Q live peaceful lives, but are starting to question their existence. What is their purpose, and what is the mysterious giant creature spotted in the sky recently? Maybe building a telescope will reveal the far away truth...

Controls:

A/D - move

E - interact

Puzzle controls explained in game.
